# The `ArgRegPair` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Structure used to represent pair of argument number after call lowering and register used to transfer that argument. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Structure used to represent pair of argument number after call lowering and register used to transfer that argument.

For now we support only cases when argument is transferred through one register.

Definition at line 488 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunction-h">MachineFunction.h</a>.
